intro: Maba elegans, commonly known as the elegant maba, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Euphorbiaceae and is characterized by its smooth, often waxy leaves. The plant produces small, greenish-yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Maba elegans is noted for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional medicine for various ailments.
